thread.title: Shep Smith Already Had Today Off
thread.title_full: Shep Smith Already Had Today Off

author: Chris Ariens
title: Shep Smith Already Had Today Off

organizations.name: adweek all rights reserved shep smith already

text:
© 2017 Adweek All Rights Reserved Shep Smith Already Had Today Off Advertisement Comment 
Before you begin to wonder whether Shepard Smith ‘s absence from Fox News today has to do with his scathing review of Pres. Trump’s news conference yesterday, we talked with Fox News and they tell us Smith already had a pre-planned day off. 
He’ll be taking Monday, Presidents’ Day, off as well. Harris Faulkner is in today. 
ICYMI, here’s Smith’s post-news conference segment from Thursday: “This president keeps telling untrue things” 
Full video of Shep Smith ripping Trump after the press conference pic.twitter.com/edTDZLRn5Z
